def main():
    n, m = map(int, input().split())
    d = list(map(int, input().split()))
    d.sort()
    print("It hadn't snowed this early in {} years!".format(d.index(m)))

main()

n, m = input().split()
n = int(n)
m = int(m)
arr = input().split()
arr = [int(x) for x in arr]

for i in range(n):
    if arr[i] <= m:
        print("It hadn't snowed this early in " + str(i) + " years!")
        break
    if i == n - 1:
        print("It had never snowed this early!")

#-----Solution-----

n,d=map(int,input().split())
a=list(map(int,input().split()))
a.append(d)
a.sort()
print("It hadn't snowed this early in",a.index(d),"years!")
